Uses of Class
net.fec.openrq.parameters.FECParameters

  • Packages that use FECParameters 
    Package Description
    net.fec.openrq
    This is the main package in the OpenRQ API.
    net.fec.openrq.decoder
    This package contains RaptorQ decoder related classes.
    net.fec.openrq.encoder
    This package contains RaptorQ encoder related classes.
    net.fec.openrq.parameters
    This package contains classes that handle FEC parameters.

    • Uses of FECParameters in net.fec.openrq

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FECParameters ArrayDataDecoder.fecParameters() 
      FECParameters ArrayDataEncoder.fecParameters() 
      Methods in net.fec.openrq with parameters of type FECParameters 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ArrayDataDecoder OpenRQ.newDecoder(FECParameters fecParams, int extraSymbols)
      Returns a DataDecoder object that decodes source data into an array of bytes, configured according to the provided FEC parameters and repair symbol overhead.
      static ArrayDataEncoder OpenRQ.newEncoder(byte[] data, FECParameters fecParams)
      Returns a DataEncoder object with an array of bytes as the source data, configured according to the provided FEC parameters.
      static ArrayDataEncoder OpenRQ.newEncoder(byte[] data, int offset, FECParameters fecParams)
      Returns a DataEncoder object with an array of bytes as the source data, configured according to the provided FEC parameters.
